share.title: Share

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.memoNotice: Please check the address label carefully.
withdraw.noticeList1: · for the safety of users' funds, the customer service of the platform may confirm your coin withdrawal operation by phone. Please pay attention to your answer.
noticeList2: , maximum withdrawal amount shall not exceed the available amount of your account.
withdraw.noticeList3: · it is recommended that you complete KYC certification to improve account security; Users who are not KYC certified will need to be audited manually to secure your funds, which may lead to excessive processing time.

withdrawSuccess.title: Withdraw Success
withdrawSuccess.notice: The withdrawal application has been submitted, please check it later.
withdrawSuccess.notice2: According to the processing speed of the block, the account arrival time is 1-2 hours.

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.notice: Only transfer the assets to the corresponding account can be traded. There is no handling charge for transfer between accounts

community.title: Trader list
community.followNotice: The current contract type already has a single person, and the same contract cannot be followed by more than one person.

leader.title: lead management
leader.notice: After opening, you may appear in the trading community and have a personal home page. At the same time, you may be followed by users. You can get extra single income and double income at zero cost.

homepage.title: HomePage
homepage.noIntro: He hasn't added a profile yet.

followEdit.amountNotice: For example: you set the number of documents to be followed by 2. No matter how many traders place orders, the number of orders you place is 2 contracts
followEdit.unitNotice: For example: every time a trader orders 200 contracts, you can follow 40 orders. When the trader places 1000 orders, you will follow 200 orders.
followEdit.singleNotice: When the accumulated follow-up principal of a single day reaches this value, the order will no longer be followed.
followEdit.scaleNotice: The follow scale cannot be less than 1.

followAgree.title: Agree
followAgree.notice1: When placing an order with a trading associate or other investors on the platform, there may be a risk of loss. In the case of improper risk control, the account may lose all its money. The risk of loss is on your own. Please know
followAgree.notice2: After confirmation, you can adjust your merchandising strategy at any time in my merchandising management, or stop following at any time. After following orders, you can manage your own orders at any time, including closing positions and stopping profits and losses. Please know
followAgree.notice3: After confirmation, 8% of the net profit will be taken as the trader's reward if the order following the opening generates profit. Note: no matter the order is closed by you or with you, the profit share of the order occurs in the settlement of foreign exchange. At the same time, you can only follow the orders placed by the follower. Other orders do not follow synchronously. Please note

option.title: Option
option.subTitle: Option
Rules: 1. Users can choose usdt or eth as margin to open positions
2. Option exercise price is the first tick after 1 min delay
3. Users can purchase call option or put option
4. When option settlement price is higher than exercise price, call option gains 10% and put option loses 10%
5. When the option settlement price is lower than the exercise price, the put option gains 10% and the call option loses 10%
6. When the option settlement price is equal to the exercise price, the call option and put option do not generate profit and loss
7. Each option purchase will generate 1% commission, and the exercise settlement is free
8. The maximum order quantity is 10 copies / time, and the order with installment right cannot be placed repeatedly in the same period
